author: P V
text:
The police have registered cases for election code violation and unlawful assembly against Minister for Higher Education Palaniappan among 100 other AIADMK district cadres here.

The violation pertained to celebratory processions carried out on March 22 on the occasion of Palacodde MLA K.P. Anbazhagan assuming office as the new district secretary of the party. The event was marked by processions to the Periyar and MGR statue leading to a traffic block.

Following a complaint registered by the Dharmapuri town VAO, a case was registered against AIADMK functionaries, including Mr. Palaniappan, district secretary K.P.Anbazhagan and 100 others. An FIR has been registered under Sections 188 (disobedience of lawfully promulgated rule; Section 143 (unlawful assembly); and Section 341 (unlawful restraint) of the IPC.

It pertains to celebratory processions

carried out on March 22
title: Model code violation case against Minister
